response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs. Given its high value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Should you decide this is the right choice for you, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly. I look forward to serving you and ensuring your satisfaction with our product.", "product_price": 9500}
